name: Антиперспирант Nivea Men Невидимый для чёрного и белого спрей, 150мл
ingredients: Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclomethicone, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isopropyl Palmitate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Octyldodecanol, Propylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Parfum.
